meanings.definition: The state or quality of being atrabilious.
meanings.sent1: His constant atrabiliousnesses made it difficult for others to approach him.
meanings.sent2: Her atrabiliousnesses often led to misunderstandings with her friends.
meanings.sent3: Despite his atrabiliousnesses, he still managed to crack a smile occasionally.
meanings.sent4: The atrabiliousnesses in the room lifted when she entered with her infectious laughter.
meanings.sent5: The atrabiliousnesses of the stormy weather matched his somber mood perfectly.

meanings.definition: The tendency to be irritable or bad-tempered.
meanings.sent1: Avoiding caffeine helped reduce his atrabiliousnesses throughout the day.
meanings.sent2: Her atrabiliousnesses flared up whenever she was running late.
meanings.sent3: His atrabiliousnesses were especially evident during rush hour traffic.
meanings.sent4: The atrabiliousnesses in his tone made it clear he was not in the mood for jokes.
meanings.sent5: The atrabiliousnesses in the office dissipated after the team successfully completed the project.

meanings.sent1: The atrabiliousnesses in her expression hinted at a deeper sadness within.
meanings.sent2: His atrabiliousnesses lifted when he received a surprise visit from an old friend.
meanings.sent3: Despite the atrabiliousnesses in the air, she remained optimistic about the future.
meanings.sent4: The atrabiliousnesses in his paintings conveyed a sense of longing and nostalgia.
meanings.sent5: The atrabiliousnesses of the music matched the gray skies outside, creating a somber atmosphere.
